    • About Willie Miranda


    Willie Miranda began his real estate career in the Capital Region in 1998 with Coldwell Banker. He left there and went to work for RE/MAX Premier until 2002, at which time he decided to go out on his own and established Miranda Real Estate Group, Inc. in July of 2002.
